formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Pressure: \( P = P_0 \left(1 - \frac{L \cdot h}{T_0}\right)^{\frac{g_0 \cdot M}{R \cdot L}} \) Temperature: \( T = T_0 - L \cdot h \) Density: \( \rho = \frac{P}{R \cdot T} \)
